Translations.Text: And the king said, "Verily, I saw in a dream seven fat kine which seven lean kine devoured; and seven green ears of corn and (seven) others dry. O you chiefs! Explain to me my vision, if dreams you can interpret
Said they, "Confused dreams! And naught know we of the interpretation of such dreams
Then he of the twain who had escaped, remembered after a while, and said, "Verily, I will inform you of the interpretation thereof, so send me forth

(When he came to Joseph, he said) "Joseph! O you truthful one! Explain to us the seven fat kine which seven lean ones devoured; and the seven green ears of corn and others dry that I may return to the people, per chance (or possibly) they then may kn
He said, "You shall sow for seven years, as is your wont; but what you reap, leave it in the ear, except a little whereof you eat
Then there shall come after that seven severe years which shall devour what you have put by before for them, save a little which you shall preserve
Then there will come after that a year in which the people shall have abundant rain and in which they shall press (wine and oil)
